title: "UC Santa Barbara Doctoral Students Build Neural Network to Paint Like Picasso"
excerpt: "Fifty years after his death, Pablo Picasso is painting once again. The late Spanish master has been reborn as a form of artificial intelligence (AI), a “neural network” created by two UC Santa Barbara doctoral students to generate original pieces of art in his signature styles."
